thread.title: CNN Says Ratings ‘Better Than Ever’ After Taking on Trump… Then STUNNING Numbers Came Out
thread.title_full: CNN Says Ratings ‘Better Than Ever’ After Taking on Trump… Then STUNNING Numbers Came Out

author: Top Right News
title: CNN Says Ratings ‘Better Than Ever’ After Taking on Trump… Then STUNNING Numbers Came Out
text:
Email 
by Gina Cassini | Top Right News 
CNN — derided by conservatives during the campaign as the Clinton News Network , has gone hard in opposition to newly-elected President Donald J. Trump, leading Trump to hit back, calling them “Fake News.” 
It’ was a very risky strategy with a newly-elected U.S. leader. But CNN brass claim it has paid off . 
Network head Jeff Zucker told worried investors this week CNN’s “brand” is “stronger than ever” : 
And at Thursday’s marathon press conference where Trump gave CNN a new label, “ Very Fake News ,” and ridiculed their ratings , reporter Jim Acosta responded: ‘They’re Pretty Good Right Now, Actually.’ 
Well it looks like Acosta might want to re-phrase that. After the ratings numbers released today , CNN’s investors may be calling for Zucker’s head. 
Because going against Trump is KILLING CNN in the ratings. 
In the most recent Adweek/TVNewser report on cable ratings, CNN is losing ground in total day viewership, and collapsing in prime time — where they spend the most money, by far. 
In fact, things have gotten so bad, CNN is now behind MSNBC — which has less than half the budget — and does not even crack the top 5 in prime time. 
And, already ahead in 2016, FoxNews is absolutely killing CNN now. OMG OMG OMG OMG #FAKENEWS @CNN is losing to 
…
